title: buying wrong champion
body:
For some reasons, My IP was not showing me a correct amount that i have.
so to check exact IP that i have, I usually click some champions cheaper than i have and they show me how much money will be left after i buy that champion.

So this time, i clicked skarner and it was purchased...
I've never been playing skarner after i bought it.
can i get a refund for buying wrong champion?

replies.body: I have the same problem but I don't have no more refund tokens available, there is nothing I can do?

If you still have refund tokens available you can use that in order to get this champion refunded. If you're having issues getting him refunded on your own for some reason, hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we might be able to help!
